field.name: description
field.value: Doesn't work with remoting (SerializationException : Type is not resolved for member 'IDemoProxy4d87a1b5a9f74bebb238ea1930835c45,DynamicProxyGenAssembly2) - which is the error given when the other side can't de-serialize on another app domain.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Closing this issue because it is old and because there are quite a lot of serialization unit tests. If it is still an issue please reopen it with repro steps.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Cannot Reproduce''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
